name: Portal After Dark
description:
As apart of the IGA game jam the theme was sun up sun down with a hint of magic! We developed this game within one weekend. 

You find yourself stranded on an unknown planet. The only way of getting out is by collecting materials to fix the portal. When night falls you will have to face the monsters inhabiting the planet.

Controls for the game 

a/d or left/right arrow keys to move player 

space to jump 

F to fire projectile 

R to reload checkpoint

JordanDickow - Producer

paconevded - Gameplay Engineer 

Niipanda - Sound Engineer / Game Designer

GothicLoliAngel - Artist
